# Speakeasy v{{version}}

## Änderungen

<!-- Release-Notes werden automatisch generiert -->

## Installation

### Client (Desktop-App)

| Platform | Download |
|----------|----------|
| Linux (AppImage) | `Speakeasy_{{version}}_amd64.AppImage` |
| Linux (DEB) | `speakeasy_{{version}}_amd64.deb` |
| Windows | `Speakeasy_{{version}}_x64-setup.exe` |
| macOS | `Speakeasy_{{version}}_x64.dmg` |

### Server (Docker)

```bash
docker pull speakeasy/server:{{version}}
docker pull speakeasy/server:latest
```

Vollständige Dokumentation: [docs/](https://github.com/7blacky7/speakeasy/tree/main/docs)
